container_info.post_install_tip: Thanks for downloading the Nearpod Add-on! To start, go to Add-ons > Nearpod > Open the Nearpod Add-on. Add Nearpod's engaging activities & multimedia directly into your Google Slides presentations. Launch the lesson from Nearpod to experience the magic.

name: Nearpod
description: The Nearpod Add-on for Google Slides allows you to easily create, edit and collaborate on new Nearpod lessons, all in Google Slides!
